data.text: The what is very new to the Emirates and the location is fantastic is there a close there is a supermarket, the restaurant is amazing The reception and stuff is helpful the management as well they are very nice as i can see the way they are Mr. Ramy and Mr razwin big thanks

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tarkan,

Greetings from Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha!

Thank you for sharing your delightful experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the wonderful service provided by Ramy and Rizwan during your stay.

We're glad you found the proximity to a supermarket convenient, and we hope it added to the overall convenience of your stay. Your positive remarks about our amazing restaurant, helpful reception staff, and the overall management team are truly appreciated.

Ramy and Rizwan will be commended for their outstanding contributions to making your experience memorable. Your kind words motivate us to continue delivering exceptional service to all our guests.

Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the future!

Sincerely,
Management
Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha
owner_response.author: Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha Management

data.text: A very beautiful hotel excellent spaciousness and exceptional service from all staff Adan fahima and mr Ramy it deserves five start and the restaurant are very courteous and good food as well than you all for your hospitality and all the employees are amazing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Momen A,

Greetings from Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha!

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback with us! We are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic experience at our hotel and that Ramy, Fahima, and Adnan made a positive impact on your stay.

It warms our hearts to know that you found our hotel beautiful with excellent spaciousness and exceptional service. We take great pride in delivering top-notch hospitality to our guests, and your kind words reinforce our commitment to providing a memorable stay.

We will make sure to pass on your compliments to Ramy, Fahima, Adnan, and the entire team. It's always a pleasure to hear that our staff's dedication and efforts contribute to a five-star experience for our guests.

We're also delighted that you enjoyed the courteous service and good food at our restaurant. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we appreciate your recognition of our team's hard work.

Thank you once again for choosing our hotel and for your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay in the future!

Sincerely,
Management
Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha
owner_response.author: Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha Management

Thank you for your kind words and generous praise! We are delighted to hear that your experience with us has been one of the best since you moved here to Dubai.

owner_response.text:
Dear Maps68208785552,

Greetings from Grand Excelsior Hotel Al Barsha!

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback with us! We are thrilled to hear that your experience with us has been excellent, especially as a business traveler.

We are delighted that you found our accommodations to be a good choice and that you appreciated the value for money. It's heartening to know that the restaurant and front desk staff contributed to your positive experience.

We will be sure to pass on your kind words to Ramy and the rest of the team. It's fantastic to hear that he provided excellent support and was able to find solutions to any issues you encountered. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we are grateful for your continued patronage.
